description: The appeal of Law and Justice against the decision of the National Electoral Commission to reject the report of the party's committee for last year's elections has been upheld. This decision was made by the Chamber of Extraordinary Control and Public Affairs of the Supreme Court.

title: Apartment prices in the largest cities. Where are the most expensive and where are the cheapest?
description: Krakow turns out to be more expensive than Warsaw in terms of prices in central districts. In the Stare Miasto district, the average price of apartments put up for sale in the third quarter of 2024 exceeded PLN 1 million. In the capital, the average price for all premises put up for sale is "only" PLN 990,430. For comparison, the most expensive district among the eight cities studied is Orłowo in Gdynia, where the average price is as much as PLN 1.61 million - according to a report by Rankomat.p

title: Tragic accident in Kenya. Two Poles dead
description: Two Polish tourists died in an accident on the Nairobi-Mombasa highway in Kenya. The men's partners and the Kenyan guide were seriously injured, according to Kenyan police.

title: 28-year-old died on the spot. Tragic accident in Silesia
description: The life of a 28-year-old man could not be saved after he was hit by a Toyota driver while overtaking. The tragedy occurred on Wednesday before 9 p.m. in Krzanowice in Racibórz County in Silesia. The road leading to Bojanów is blocked.

title: Spain, Portugal and Morocco will host the 2030 World Cup.
description: Spain, Portugal and Morocco will host the 2030 FIFA World Cup, FIFA announced. Four years later, the tournament will be held in Saudi Arabia.

title: Hour-long conversation between Orban and Putin. Zelensky's sharp comment
description: The Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban had an hour-long telephone conversation with Russian President Vladimir Putin. The politicians discussed Ukraine, Orban said on Facebook. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky commented sharply on the information.

title: Money from KPO for Poland. Szyszko: EC approved the payment of PLN 40 billion
description: The EC has approved the payment of PLN 40 billion from the second and third payment application from the KPO; the transfer will reach Poland for the holidays - said Jan Szyszko, Deputy Minister of Funds, on Wednesday. He added that another KPO review will probably begin at the turn of January and February 2025.

title: Okła-Drewnowicz: The grey zone is flourishing when it comes to care services
description: We have a thriving grey zone when it comes to care services," said Marzena Okła-Drewnowicz, Minister for Senior Policy, in an afternoon interview on RMF FM. She added that the solution to this problem could be a senior voucher, which the government is working on.

title: Case of acting to the detriment of Grupa Lotos. Investigation against former president dismissed
description: The District Prosecutor's Office in Gdańsk has discontinued the investigation into, among others, the former CEO of Grupa Lotos, Paweł Olechnowicz, who was suspected of causing significant financial damage to the company in 2011 - the spokesman for the Regional Prosecutor's Office announced on Wednesday.

title: Driver faints in sports car and drives against traffic in Warsaw, four cars wrecked
description: Serious accident on Trasa Toruńska in Warsaw. On the lane towards Marki in the tunnel behind Łabiszyńska, a sports car driven by a 21-year-old collided head-on with three other vehicles. The driver had previously lost consciousness and was driving against traffic. It's a miracle that no one was hurt.

title: Marcin Romanowski still at large. Police search
description: The police will file a motion to prosecute Marcin Romanowski if he is not found at the indicated addresses - a reporter from RMF FM has learned. The former deputy minister of justice suspected in the Justice Fund scandal is to be taken into custody in accordance with the court's decision.

title: Andrzej Śliwka guest of Rozmowa at 7:00 on Radio RMF24
description: Tomasz Terlikowski's guest in Rozmowa at 7:00 on Radio RMF24 will be Andrzej Śliwka, member of Karol Nawrocki's campaign team, MP from Law and Justice. We will talk about social media and the use of reach in Karol Nawrocki's campaign.

title: Burns, fractures, bites. Father and stepmother guilty of beating 10-year-old Sara
description: Sara Sharif's father and stepmother were convicted of her murder. The 10-year-old was found dead in a house near London in August 2023. British media wrote at the time about Sara's mother's Polish origins.

title: She criticized Minister Bodnar. Prosecutor Wrzosek informs about his decision
description: Prosecutor Ewa Wrzosek announced on Wednesday that the head of the Ministry of Justice, Prosecutor General Adam Bodnar, had dismissed her from her delegation to the Ministry of Justice and the National Council of Prosecutors. In the Ministry of Justice, Wrzosek served as the minister's advisor for conditions of prosecutorial service.

title: A difficult coalition, but with successes. Hołownia summed up a year of government
description: The Speaker of the Sejm, Szymon Hołownia, referring to the year of the coalition government, assessed that there is no reason to celebrate. "We have a reason to roll up our sleeves even more and get down to work, because at the halfway point of this term we will have to show people a higher percentage of fulfilled promises," he said.

title: Święczkowski plans talks on the Constitutional Tribunal. Invitations will be sent by the end of the week
description: The President of the Constitutional Tribunal, Bogdan Święczkowski, declares that he wants to reach a compromise in the functioning of the institution entrusted to him. He announced that invitations to talks on this matter will be sent by the end of the week.

title: Premature euphoria of PiS? Categorical declaration regarding the Supreme Court
description: The Ministry of Finance has no intention of recognizing the decision of the Chamber of Extraordinary Control and Public Affairs of the Supreme Court regarding Law and Justice. This concerns Wednesday's decision regarding the payment of subsidies to PiS.

title: Accident at Poznań's Apollo cinema. Woman seriously injured
description: During a performance at the Apollo cinema in Poznań, a serious accident occurred. A piece of scenography fell on a woman, causing serious injuries. The injured woman was taken to hospital. The police are investigating the circumstances of the incident.

title: Awful crime against Sara. Court makes decision on Polish woman's daughter
description: On Wednesday, a London court found the father and stepmother of 10-year-old Sara Sharif guilty of her murder. The incident, which took place on August 8, 2023, caused a stir among the British. The investigation found that the girl had been subjected to brutal actions and torture before her death. Sara was the daughter of a Polish mother and a Pakistani man.

title: Former South Korean Defense Minister in custody after attempting to kill himself
description: Kim Jong Hyun, former South Korean defense minister, attempted suicide while in custody. The politician was detained in connection with the declaration of martial law by Seoul.

title: Zelensky explained. He is ready to make such concessions
description: Considering the prospect of Ukraine joining the North Atlantic Alliance, President Volodymyr Zelensky told CBN News that such membership could apply only to the area controlled by Ukrainian authorities, while emphasizing that Kiev has no intention of involving other countries in an armed conflict.

title: Suspicious fapejdz supported Nawrocki. He has a long history
description: Since PiS announced its support for Karol Nawrocki, the web has been swarming with unofficial sites supporting his presidential aspirations. One of them was a fan page with almost 100,000 likes that had previously promoted Russian propaganda, among other things.

title: Understandable for every patriot". Tusk hit PiS
description: Protecting Polish media from Russian hostile takeover seems to be an obvious need of the hour. It is understandable to every patriot," Donald Tusk said in the post. "So why did PiS politicians get so furious after the announcement of this decision?" he added.

title: Ukraine is in turmoil. Parents are ready to take teenagers out of the country
description: Experts from the Ukrainian General Staff warned in the media that the current rate of mobilization does not cover the losses suffered on the front. This is one of the arguments for lowering the age of people subject to mobilization to 18. The country was in uproar when US officials put President Zelensky before this dramatic choice.

title: Orban and Putin talked about Ukraine. But not only
description: Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban held a telephone conversation with Russian President Vladimir Putin about the situation in Ukraine, a statement he made on social media, oddly emphasizing the importance of diplomacy in the pursuit of peace.

title: US Ambassador Responds to Tusk's Decision on TVN
description: The US Ambassador to Poland, Mark Brzezinski, commented on Donald Tusk's announcement to recognize TVN and Polsat as strategic companies. "Media pluralism is the foundation of democracy," he emphasized in a post on social media.

title: Israel's "Preemptive Action" in Syria: Experts Say New Front Line
description: Hours after the Assad regime was toppled in Syria, the Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) began airstrikes on targets in Syria and deployed troops to a buffer zone in the Golan Heights. According to experts, Israel took advantage of the chaos following the rebel takeover and decided to take "preemptive action.

title: TVN Takeover Case. Will Trump Influence the Transaction?
description: Speculations about the sale of TVN are growing. On Nowogrodzka Street they hope that the new US president will "pressure Tusk" to allow the sale of the station - reports "Newsweek

title: Two Teenagers Missing. Police Appeal for Help
description: In Wielkopolska, 15-year-old Wiktoria and Brajan have gone missing. Police from Leszno have published images and descriptions of the teenagers with an appeal for help in determining their whereabouts.

title: Kaczyński triumphs. He posted a post after the Supreme Court chamber's decision
description: The unrecognized Chamber of Extraordinary Control and Public Affairs of the Supreme Court upheld PiS's complaint against the National Electoral Commission's decision to reject the report of that party's committee for the 2023 elections. The Supreme Court's decision was commented on social media by, among others, PiS chairman Jarosław Kaczyński.

title: Government reveals what the "asylum suspension" will look like. Granica Group: A Difficult Day for Human Rights
description: The government has revealed the assumptions of the draft law, which will allow for the "temporary suspension of the right to asylum". An extension of the "buffer zone" has also come into effect. - Beautiful gifts for International Human Rights Day - activists ironically say.

title: Neo-judges have decided on the PiS subsidy. "The resolution of the National Electoral Commission has been repealed
description: The Supreme Court’s Chamber of Control, composed of neo-judges, upheld the complaint of the PiS electoral committee and overturned the National Electoral Commission’s decision to reject its financial report.

title: The prosecutors who dismissed Kurski's son's case are in trouble. There is an investigation
description: Investigators will look into Gdańsk prosecutors who conducted or supervised the investigation into Zdzisław K. The proceedings were initiated on Wednesday, following the text by "Wyborcza" and a sharp reaction from Prime Minister Tusk.

title: TVN and Polsat will be on the list of strategic companies. Tusk: The matter is very serious
description: Prime Minister Donald Tusk announced on Wednesday that two private television stations - TVN and Polsat - will be added to the list of strategic companies, which means that they cannot be sold without the government's consent. The regulation on this matter is to be ready next week.

title: Where is Marcin Romanowski? "In such situations, the lawyer tries not to know
description: For now, there has been no decision to issue an arrest warrant for the PiS MP and former Deputy Minister of Justice - we are told by the National Prosecutor's Office.

title: Kaczyński questioned by prosecutor's office regarding letter to Ziobro
description: - I don't know what the conversation will be about - said the PiS chairman, entering the prosecutor's office on Wednesday morning. Jarosław Kaczyński was questioned as the author of a letter to Zbigniew Ziobro. In it, he warned against using money from the Justice Fund in the campaign.

title: NIK report: Poland cannot cope with animal homelessness. Three types of action are needed
description: The Supreme Audit Office examined the finances of municipalities and looked into shelters. It concluded: the system does not require correction so much as creation from scratch. Municipalities are spending more and more on caring for homeless animals, and the number of them is only growing.

title: Gawryluk's ties with Morawiecki, devastation of trees on the border with Belarus [SUMMARY OF THE DAY'S EVENTS]
description: Every day we publish hundreds of texts, our site changes very dynamically. Here we collect the most important news of the day.

title: Dorota Gawryluk's Association pays Morawiecki's advisor. "Wyborcza" knows the content of the agreement
description: The association Lepsza Polska, associated with Polsat, pays PLN 30,000 per month to the company of one of the closest advisors of former Prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki. "Wyborcza" has the content of a confidential agreement for "consulting and public relations services".

title: Grand Press 2024. Three awards for "Gazeta Wyborcza
description: On Tuesday evening, the Polish History Museum in Warsaw hosted the awards ceremony for the 28th Grand Press competition. Among the winners in three categories were journalists from "Gazeta Wyborcza".

title: Kierwiński's tour of the flood areas. What did he promise?
description: In subsequent posts Kierwiński announced further millions, this time for the construction of bridges. In December, three months after the flood.

title: Nawrocki advises Trzaskowski: It is worth being ourselves
description: It takes much more energy to pretend to be someone you're not than to present your program and yourself.

title: Zelensky made a proposal for Ukraine's membership in NATO
description: Diplomatically, we need to figure out a way to achieve our goals. And our goals are lasting peace, the Ukrainian president said.

title: A famous journalist became Nawrocki's spokeswoman
description: Wierzbicki thanked for being part of Karol Nawrocki's team.

title: Deputy head of the European Commission: States can suspend the right to asylum
description: These measures must be exceptional and temporary," she stressed.

title: Is dictatorship funny, terrible, or somehow even more stupid?
Strong appeal from Lechia Gdańsk fan: Nawrocki is our candidate

title: Kino Świat's CEO is leaving. Her successor is from abroad
description: The film distributor Kino Świat, owned by Canal+ Polska, is parting ways with CEO Urszula Piasecka. The company will be temporarily managed from January by Kalle Friz, a member of its board and head of StudioCanal Germany.

title: The German press program has disappeared from the Republic
description: The main channel of Telewizja Republika no longer airs the weekly "Przegląd prasy niemieckiej" hosted by Aleksander Wierzejski. The program has been moved to the broadcaster's second station.

title: New series with Więckiewicz on Netflix. Premiere in a month
description: Netflix has released a trailer for the series "Wzgórze pies," an adaptation of Jakub Żulczyk's novel of the same name. The main roles are played by Robert Więckiewicz and Mateusz Kościukiewicz. The series' premiere date has also been revealed.

title: Big changes at Rochstar. New managing director talks about the company's plans
description: Andrzej Mytych has become the managing director and vice-president of the production company Rochstar - as established by the portal Wirtualnemedia.pl. Rochstar is now focusing on its own formats, has started producing for streaming platforms and has also moved to a new headquarters.

title: More cuts at AXN. Broadcaster in Poland without a programming director
description: Agnieszka Zawadzka-Jopek, who took over as programming manager for AXN channels on the Polish market in March, announced that her contract was being terminated. She explained that Antenna Entertainment wants to continue its operations in our country without the position of programming manager.

title: Polish Formula 1 engineer joins Eleven Sports
description: Marcin Budkowski will be the expert for Eleven Sports' Formula 1 coverage. He previously worked in this role with Viaplay, and was an engineer for several F1 teams in the past.

title: 101 awards in the Złote Spinacze 2024 competition. Director from the Żywiec Group is a PR star
description: During the 22nd edition of the Golden Clips competition, organized by the Public Relations Companies Association, a total of 101 awards were given. The Titanium Clip for "Best in the competition" went to the agency 38 Content Communication. For the first time, the Crystal Clip was awarded for exemplary client tender practices - it went to Unilever. The title of PR Star was honored to Magdalena Brzezińska, who is responsible for communication of Grupa Żywiec.

title: Nasdaq hits 20,000 points! Tesla is the most expensive in history
description: The Wall Street bull market is gaining momentum as the market looks to the Federal Reserve for a generous gift.

title: Facebook outage. Users worldwide had trouble accessing
description: Problems with apps owned by Meta. Users reported problems with Facebook, Messenger, Instagram, and Whatsapp. After 10 p.m., most Meta app users regained access to their social media accounts.

title: Lewandowski without a goal in Dortmund. Greedy strikes for the first time in the Champions League
description: Robert Lewandowski didn't score this time. In the 6th round of the Champions League, his Barcelona team defeated Borussia Dortmund 3:2 away. Łukasz Łakomy scored a goal on Wednesday evening, but the Young Boys Bern team he represents lost to VfB Stuttgart 1:5.

title: Karol Nawrocki introduced his spokeswoman. Viewers know her very well from television
description: On December 11, 2024, Karol Nawrocki, a candidate for the President of the Republic of Poland supported by PiS, met with the residents of Tomaszów Mazowiecki. During the rally, he introduced his spokeswoman. It is Emilia Wierzbicki. She is well known to some viewers.

title: Zelensky on ending the war. He gave a key condition
description: President Volodymyr Zelenskyy, speaking to the Protestant CBN News television station, said that only inviting Ukraine to NATO could help end the war. He added that NATO membership could in practice apply to territory controlled by Ukraine.

title: Watch out for these herrings! GIS warns that a very dangerous bacterium has been detected in them
description: The Chief Sanitary Inspectorate in a special announcement warns consumers about a batch of herring with leek. A dangerous bacteria was detected in the product. Stores are removing this product from their offer. You definitely should not eat this herring.

title: Former Polish national team player does not support Legia Warsaw in the Conference League
description: Kacper Przybyłko admitted that he is not a fan of Legia Warsaw in the Conference League. No wonder. On Thursday evening, his FC Lugano will face the "military" at Łazienkowska in the 5th round of these games.

title: Kacper Stokowski broke the Polish record and stood on the podium of the World Swimming Championships
description: Kacper Stokowski stood on the podium of the World Short Course Swimming Championships. The Pole won the bronze medal in Budapest in the 100m backstroke. Our compatriot achieved a time of 49.16 seconds, which is a new national record. Russian Miron Lifincew (48.76) and Hungarian Hubert Kos (48.79) were faster.

title: Revolution in the program "Totalne remonty Szelągowska". A member of the team goes to the competition
description: Dorota Szelągowska's collaborator on her TVN show is moving to the competition. An official statement has been released. The much-loved carpenter from "Totalne remonty Szelągoskiej" will soon join the team of the popular format on Polsat.

The editorial forecast is the author's own and indicates a list of European politicians who will determine the direction in which Europe will go. There are positive and negative heroes on it. Politico's "Class of 2025" list also includes four politicians from Poland.

Wray announced that he will step down three years before the end of his term to avoid conflict with Donald Trump. The president-elect called the news "a great day for America.

description: The holiday season is a marketing marathon, but experience teaches us that the race does not end at the December finish line. Q5, or the so-called fifth quarter, is ahead of us. The period from late December to mid-January conceals a great deal of untapped potential. Lower media costs and sustained consumer demand (as many as 41% of people continue shopping after the holidays) create ideal conditions for achieving sales success.

title: Hubert Niedzielski will stop dealing with Porsche communication

title: Tax relief for returning from abroad. How not to lose it in the last days of the year?
description: An emigrant who plans to take advantage of the tax relief on returning from 2025 cannot come to Poland for Christmas or New Year's Eve, nor to seek treatment here in the last days of the year. And until the end of this year, he should not bring his children or spouse from abroad.

title: Students will have more time to write their eighth-grade exam
description: Youth taking the eighth-grade exam will have about 25 percent more time to write a paper. The number of tasks to complete will not be increased.

title: Liquidation of rural schools. Ministry of Education does not agree
description: In the coming months, it will be difficult to liquidate a small, rural school. The Ministry of Education does not agree to this. However, next year, proposals are to appear that will make it easier for local governments to maintain smaller facilities.

title: The prosecutor's office will wait for its own budget. It is supposed to take another two years
description: The prosecutor's office is being pushed back by two years to gain independence in terms of designing its revenues and expenditures. The latest version of the draft law separating the functions of the prosecutor general and the minister of finance provides that the budget for 2027 will be the first in which the prosecutor general will be authorized to prepare and submit to the minister of finance a separate part concerning the prosecutor's office, in order to include it in the budget act.

title: The vagueness of explanations does not pay off in the tender
description: Explanations regarding an abnormally low price must be specific, coherent and exhaustive already at the stage of providing them. Arguments and evidence raised only at the hearing before the National Chamber of Appeal are late and cannot be taken into account.

title: No mechanism for suspending the activities of companies in the National Court Register. Sanctions that cannot be applied
description: The fourth version of the draft amendment to the Act on the National Cybersecurity System (Journal of Laws of 2022, item 1863, as amended; hereinafter referred to as the National Court Register) provides for the possibility of applying to the court to suspend the activities of a key entity entered in the National Court Register until the deficiencies are removed or the violations cease. The problem is that there is no such procedure.

title: Unusual reports. Trump invited Xi to inauguration?

title: UN passes resolution on Gaza Strip. Israel and US opposed
description: The UN General Assembly passed a resolution Wednesday calling for an immediate and unconditional ceasefire in the Gaza Strip. Nine countries opposed it, including Israel and the United States. A similar resolution was defeated in a vote at the UN Security Council in late November.

title: Will sailors get a big present under the Christmas tree? This is a long-awaited ship
description: In mid-November, the Armament Agency confirmed that it had launched the procedure for acquiring a rescue ship for the "Ratownik" program. This is the third attempt at this program. Perhaps the old saying "third time's a charm" will prove true and this time it will have a happy ending. This is the voice coming from the Polish armaments industry.

title: Trump sets dangerous conditions for Europe. Is Poland calm? "It's a facade
description: Donald Trump, while still the US president, has repeatedly stressed the need for European countries to increase their spending on defence. He repeated this in an interview with NBC, saying that Europeans need to start treating the US fairly. He also added that if Europe does not do this, he will consider leaving NATO.

title: Russia Gives North Korea Dangerous Weapons? This Is Payment for Fighting Ukraine
description: American military commanders believe that Russia and North Korea have concluded a secret agreement in which, in exchange for sending troops to the Ukrainian front, Kim Jong-un demanded supplies of Russian Su-27 and MiG-29 fighters. He is also said to demand access to submarine construction technology.

title: The crisis in Romania is a great lesson for Europe. "It worries us
description: Romanian court invalidates presidential elections. After this decision, the winner of the first round, Calin Georgescu, stated that "the corrupt system made a pact with the devil". The events in Romania must be a lesson for other countries.

title: The End of Russia's Bastion in Syria. What About Military Bases?
description: The overthrow of Bashar al-Assad significantly weakens Russia's influence in the Middle East. Moscow was, after all, the main sponsor and defender of the Syrian regime, alongside Tehran.

title: This defense system could turn our tanks into fortresses. We are still delaying. Armor alone is not enough
description: EuroTrophy GmbH has received an order from KNDS Deutschland for the delivery of Trophy HV active vehicle protection system kits for 123 German Leopard 2A8 tanks. The number of users of such solutions is growing. However, Poland is not among them...

title: Europe must take care of its own security, without looking at the US and Trump
description: Polish authorities are working on creating a new security strategy. This is necessary because the world is becoming an increasingly unfriendly place. So what will determine our security? We talk about this with Dr. Hab. Agnieszka Bieńczyk-Missala, professor at the University of Warsaw.

title: K2 Tank Deliveries in Danger? Korea's Post-Martial Law Confusion
description: Last week's short-lived martial law in South Korea may also affect Poland - specifically, its arms purchases from that country. Let us recall: the Polish Army is ordering K2 tanks, K9 howitzers, rocket launchers and FA-50 aircraft from that country. Korean media indicate that equipment deliveries may be delayed.

title: We understand and accept spending on tanks, but not on these things. The head of the National Security Bureau on the huge funds
description: We are as a society ready to spend huge amounts of money on armaments if it involves the delivery of new tanks or missiles; however, it is difficult to explain to the society the costs associated with, for example, storing ammunition or training - noted on Monday the head of the National Security Bureau, Jacek Siewiera.

title: Invalidation of the presidential elections in Romania
description: Invalidation of the presidential elections in Romania

description: OSCE Ministerial Council Meeting in Malta

title: Prospects of threat from Russia's new missile and nuclear capabilities
description: Prospects of threat from Russia's new missile and nuclear capabilities

title: The head of the National Security Bureau on the coup in Syria: from Poland's point of view, I see many potential threats here
description: It is worth paying attention to two issues here - the military and political dimension, because in both - I have the impression - the optimism associated with the belief that this is a great defeat of the Russian Federation is too far-reaching. This form of optimism can be maintained by global powers" - emphasized the Head of the National Security Bureau Jacek Siewiera during Monday's edition of the program "Fakty po faktach" on TVN24. "From the point of view of regional security and Polish inte

title: Head of the National Security Bureau: a defense ministry should be established in Poland
description: We are as a society ready to spend huge amounts of money on armaments if it involves the delivery of new tanks or missiles. However, it is difficult to explain to society the costs associated with storing ammunition or training, noted the head of the National Security Bureau Jacek Siewiera on Monday. As he pointed out, he is convinced of the need to establish an armaments ministry in Poland, similar to DAPA in South Korea or SSB in Turkey.

title: BBN chief: Russia is currently unable to conduct operations in many theaters
description: The coup in Syria, the fall of the regime is a message to global powers that the Russian Federation - with its involvement in Ukraine - is not able to conduct operations in many theaters - assessed the Head of the National Security Bureau Jacek Siewiera. During the conference entitled "Lessons from the war in Ukraine - equipment and structure of the Polish army and Civil Defense" he also spoke about the situation in Syria.

title: The head of the National Security Bureau on the consequences of the fall of the Syrian regime for Poland's security
description: After the phase of dynamic events that have taken place in Syria in recent days, each country must ask itself how this situation translates into its direct security interests," said the Head of the National Security Bureau, Jacek Siewiera, in TOK FM. "And this perspective is much less optimistic than what is described in the global dimension, for the big players," he emphasized.

title: Bus collides with tram in Wrocław. There are injured people
description: A tram collided with a public transport bus in Wrocław. Four people were slightly injured in the accident. The police reported traffic disruptions.

title: Volodymyr Zelensky spoke with Donald Tusk. He revealed the background
description: The President of Ukraine reported that he spoke with Donald Tusk by phone. I thanked him for his unwavering support of friendly Poland, Volodymyr Zelensky said. The politicians also agreed on mutual visits in the near future.

title: Butter prices up sharply. Expert cites two main factors
description: - We were so keen on this butter, and when we look at the inflation readings, we can see that sugar has become significantly cheaper - noted Anna Gołębicka from the Adam Smith Center. In Jankowski's Point of View, she explained that we pay more for fat in cubes because in the summer - due to drought - cows could not give as much milk as they usually did. The situation was also worsened by New Zealand's decision.

title: The Fashion Center is located in Sosnowiec. A unique place has been created
description: Are we facing the decline of the popularity of creations from Milan or Paris? Their place may be taken by... Sosnowiec. The city has outlined serious plans to become a recognizable point on the fashion map of the world. Students who will be educated in the first Fashion Center in Poland are to help with this.

title: The Last Generation wrote a letter to Poles. "A chronic state of emergency
description: The government should take action comparable to the Marshall Plan, say activists from the Last Generation, who have been blocking the streets of Warsaw for some time now. In their opinion, the threats resulting from the climate catastrophe will result in a permanent state of emergency. In an open letter, they appealed for solidarity and stated that the Polish authorities are consciously fueling the crisis.

title: Mysterious disease in Africa. There is a special GIS announcement
description: The Chief Sanitary Inspectorate warns of a mysterious disease spreading in the Democratic Republic of Congo. As a result, dozens of people, especially young ones, have died. In turn, the World Health Organization has sent experts to the site to diagnose the disturbing phenomenon.

title: Freezing electricity prices. Andrzej Duda decides the fate of the bill
description: The President signed 10 laws on Tuesday, including an amendment to freeze electricity prices, the Chancellery of the President of the Republic of Poland reported. Other projects that were recognized included assistance to persons entitled to alimony, foreign service, ammunition production, and promoting electricity generation in offshore wind farms.

title: Meat-cutting brawl leaves 43-year-old dead
description: Police officers from Lubartów, Lublin, detained a 54-year-old woman who killed her partner. According to investigators, the man did not want to help her cut up the meat. A row ensued, during which the woman stabbed the 43-year-old. His life could not be saved.

title: Tragic series of poisonings in Poland. Alarming results of inspections
description: Buyers without permission, knowledge gained from the Internet and sellers who do not check permits - this is the result of the control of the fumigants market, carried out by the Plant Protection and Seed Inspectorate. It was initiated after a tragic series of poisonings among children. In this case, Deputy Minister of Agriculture Michał Kołodziejczak filed a notice to the prosecutor's office.

title: Antoni Macierewicz arrested behind the wheel. "He claimed immunity
description: Antoni Macierewicz was arrested on Tuesday behind the wheel of a car, although it was previously reported that the PiS politician would lose his driving license. The spokesman for the Ministry of the Interior and Administration, Jacek Dobrzyński, commented on the case. The MP claimed immunity and refused to submit to a road check and a sobriety test, he said, adding that in such a situation, the police refrained from further action.

title: Bat on patostreams. Krzysztof Gawkowski announces serious changes
description: - This is a spin to avoid responsibility - this is how Krzysztof Gawkowski assessed in Gość Wydarzeń the fact that Marcin Romanowski did not appear in court. The Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Digital Affairs also spoke about how the government wants to limit minors' access to harmful content on the web, including patostreams. - This week we will present the first legislative acts - he announced.

title: The Act on the Liquidation of the Central Anticorruption Bureau. There is a government decision, Donald Tusk announces
description: On Tuesday, the government adopted a draft law on the liquidation of the Central Anticorruption Bureau. - None of us has any doubts that what has happened to this service in recent years has been a mockery of the mission for which it was established - emphasized Prime Minister Donald Tusk. The current CBA is to be replaced by a new division in the police: the Central Anticorruption Bureau.

title: Bogdan Święczkowski appeals to the authorities. He wants talks with, among others, Donald Tusk
description: Bogdan Święczkowski, the new president of the Constitutional Tribunal, announced meetings with the most important people in the country. As he calculated, he wants to talk about the functioning of the Constitutional Tribunal with the Prime Minister, the Marshals of the Sejm and Senate, and the President of the National Bank of Poland. He also referred to comments that he became the head of the Tribunal, although in the past he was associated with PiS. - I have never been an MP - Święczkowski sta

title: Antoni Macierewicz behind the wheel. The police stopped his car. "I didn't lose my driving license
description: Antoni Macierewicz was arrested behind the wheel of a car, although it had been previously reported that the PiS MP would lose his driving license. "I have not received (this) document. When I receive it, I will immediately cash it," he said in an interview with a Polsat News reporter. Earlier, in front of the Smolensk monument, there were scuffles between Macierewicz, activists and police.

title: Investigation into Jacek Kurski's son. Donald Tusk turns to Adam Bodnar
description: - There will be no impunity for those who despise the suffering of children who are victims of sexual violence - said Prime Minister Donald Tusk. He noted that he will ask the Prosecutor General for information on the double discontinuation of the investigation into Zdzisław Antoni K., son of a prominent PiS politician - Jacek Kurski.

title: Emmanuel Macron will visit Poland. Donald Tusk confirms
description: - Emmanuel Macron will visit Warsaw - said Prime Minister Donald Tusk at a government meeting. As he revealed, the visit is to take place on Thursday. - Poland assumes leadership in the European Union from January 1 in a very dramatic situation - he said. The Prime Minister added that the government will adopt priorities for the presidency of the EU Council.

title: He was doing push-ups in the street. A Fiat ran over him.
description: He walked in the middle of the road, lay down in front of oncoming cars and did push-ups in the middle of the street until one of the vehicles hit him. When the police arrived, the 43-year-old complained that he had been hit. It turned out that he was drunk.

title: Police practiced at shooting range. Woman hit in the head
description: The woman was probably wounded in the head by a bullet. A nearby shooting range was conducting exercises with police officers, and the object that hit the 53-year-old could have been a ricochet. The case is being investigated by police and prosecutors. The woman is not in danger.

title: After a visit to the service, the tractor stopped working. It is worth 800 thousand PLN
description: A farmer from Podlasie spent PLN 800,000 on a new tractor that worked for only a month. Grzegorz Krom claims that the problems started when he took the machine to an authorized dealer to install a front linkage. In his opinion, the electronics have been failing ever since. The dealer claims that the farmer himself is to blame, because he was working with the tractor... in mud. Intervention Material.

title: Kaczyński at the Smolensk monthly commemoration. "The state is helpless against the agents
description: - We are dealing here with permanent violation of the law also by the current government. The previous ones kept this group of troublemakers and agents away from us, unfortunately this is not the case now - said Jarosław Kaczyński during the Smolensk monthly commemoration at Piłsudski Square.

title: He pretended to be his brother. He got caught because the police looked under the windshield wiper.
description: The 36-year-old's problems began with a simple speeding violation, for which he was stopped by the Wrocław traffic police. A police check revealed more irregularities. Not only was the man driving under the influence of alcohol, he had a lifetime driving ban and tried to pass himself off as his brother, but the car also had false license plates.

title: How much does a Christmas tree cost from the State Forests? The cheapest offers are surprising
description: When deciding to buy a Christmas tree from the State Forests, we will pay from about PLN 40 to PLN 130 for a Christmas tree. The cost is made up of the type of plant, its height, but also the place of purchase, because forest districts set prices individually.

title: PiS with a narrow advantage. The latest poll
description: The largest political groups in Poland have similar support, but in the latest poll, PiS is on top. Although the advantage is minimal, about 0.3 percentage points, Jarosław Kaczyński's party has taken the lead.

title: They got a beating when it comes to communication". Radosław Fogiel on the KO convention
description: - Generally, the accusation is that the organizations that were not supported were those that today's government would like. Because if you support left-wing organizations, Rafał Trzaskowski supports the LGBT museum, then it's OK - Radosław Fogiel argued, commenting on the decision to arrest Marcin Romanowski. The MP indicated that the actions against the politician are of a political nature.

title: What about religious education classes in schools? Church announces legal action
description: Government representatives failed to reach an agreement with the Episcopate on religious education in schools. The Polish Episcopal Conference announced in a statement that it would take further legal steps. The statement also emphasized that the proposed changes would lead to the destruction of the religious education system.

title: Lotto Results for December 9, 2024. Check Your Winnings
description: On Monday, December 9, 2024, the draws for the number games run by Totalizator Sportowy took place. Which numbers turned out to be lucky? Here are the results of the draw: Ekstra Pensja, Ekstra Premia, Kaskada, Mini Lotto, Multi Multi.

title: Will the president have an impact on butter prices? "Mental decline
description: - Minister Szłapka's statement in the context of what Rafał Trzaskowski will potentially do with the prices of various products is only a demonstration of mental degradation - PiS MP Olga Semeniuk-Patkowska stated in the Gozdyra Debate. The ongoing presidential pre-campaign is accompanied by a heated discussion on the price of butter.

title: Tragedy on the highway near Krakow. 80-year-old woman dies
description: A woman has died after being hit by a truck on the A4 motorway near Krakow. The road towards Katowice is blocked. Emergency services are working on the scene.

title: Travels with Polish Radio for Abroad. Museum of King Jan III's Palace in Wilanów
description: Travels with Polish Radio for Abroad. Museum of King Jan III's Palace in Wilanów

title: Poles in South America. "We want to cultivate Polish roots
description: Poles in South America. "We want to cultivate Polish roots

title: 15th Anniversary of the Polish Family Support Centre in Edinburgh
description: 15th Anniversary of the Polish Family Support Centre in Edinburgh

title: Only 3 km left. The Russians are approaching inexorably
description: Russian troops are now just 3 km from Pokrovsk, CNN reports, citing DeepState, a service that tracks the situation on the front in Ukraine and maps it on its own maps. These reports are confirmed by the Ukrainian army.

title: Zygmunt Solorz speaks out after the "Wyborcza" article. "The nervous reactions of my children and their advisors
description: - It is not true that any court has blocked my assets - Zygmunt Solorz issued a statement on Tuesday regarding our publication.

title: Święczkowski wants a "compromise". First conference of the new president of the Constitutional Tribunal
description: - I would like to hold talks with people who have something to say in the Republic of Poland and bring about a situation in which the functioning of the Tribunal will not be threatened - announced on Tuesday Bogdan Święczkowski, appointed president of the Constitutional Tribunal.

title: Donald Tusk speaks out on Jacek Kurski's son. "There can be no sacred cows
description: Just because the perpetrator was the son of a prominent PiS politician, the prosecutor's office, instead of prosecuting the accused, did everything to avoid justice" - said Prime Minister Tusk about the case of Zdzisław Kurski. "My son is being attacked by political enemies and an LGBT activist" - claims Jacek Kurski.

title: CBA must be solved. But first we must be able to solve them
description: The act on the liquidation of the CBA and the transfer of the Office's competences to the structures of the police, the ABW and the treasury adopted by the government on Tuesday makes no sense. But this is not about substantive considerations, the concept of the new service, or the general shape of the act.

title: Lawyers on the Last Generation protests: The state should respond to drivers' aggression
description: - The Last Generation's protest is peaceful. However, drivers use violence. And this should be met with a decisive reaction from a democratic state - says the head of Amnesty International Poland.

title: Warsaw Trail on Kopa Cwila vol. 5 - PHOTO REPORT
description: On Sunday, December 8, 2024, we finished this year's series of "Warsaw Running Trails". The last trail this year took place on Kopa Cwila in Warsaw's Ursynów district. 50 people took part in it. We invite you to the next trails next year (details soon), and today we invite you to see the photo report from the last race.

title: Sports St. Nicholas Day at the Moczydło Centre
description: On December 15, 2024, from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m., we invite you to a unique ice skating event at the Moczydło Center. We plan shows and animations that will delight every child.

title: Presidential Election 2025. Karol Nawrocki was asked about the price of butter. Here's what he said
description: Karol Nawrocki, the PiS “civic” candidate for President of the Republic of Poland, met with the residents of Siedlce, where he raised the issue of inflation and addressed the recently heated issue of butter prices.

title: Poll: Is the presidential campaign already underway? Poles agree
description: Never before has a presidential campaign picked up so quickly and reached such high speed so many months before the election, as confirmed by the latest poll for "Rzeczpospolita".

title: Antoni Macierewicz arrested by police. He refused to submit to inspection
description: Former Minister of National Defense Antoni Macierewicz, a PiS MP, was detained by the police, TVP Info and TV Republika report. The MP, claiming immunity, refused to undergo a road check and a sobriety test.

title: The Left Will Field Three Candidates for President? "They Put Party Interests Above National Interest
description: If the Razem party puts up its Adrian Zandberg, Senator Waldemar Witkowski from the Labor Union will also run – according to talks in “Rzeczpospolita”. This would mean the fragmentation of the left in the presidential elections on an unprecedented scale.

title: Bogdan Święczkowski gave his first interview to Trwam Television. He indicated his goal as the president of the Constitutional Tribunal
description: The new president of the Constitutional Tribunal, Bogdan Święczkowski, shared his priorities for the next six years in an interview with Telewizja Trwam.

title: Szymon Hołownia: The first round of presidential elections may take place during the May bank holiday
description: I will not resign from the position of Marshal of the Sejm, which is a political position, unlike, for example, the head of the Institute of National Remembrance, who is expected to be apolitical. Karol Nawrocki should resign from his position – Szymon Hołownia, leader of Poland 2050, tells "Rzeczpospolita".

title: Will there be amnesty for Polish volunteers fighting in Ukraine?
description: Illegal, but no longer punishable – the Civic Coalition wants to regulate the participation of Polish citizens in the war in Ukraine against Russia. Even the Confederation does not say "no".

title: The Last Generation explains the reasons for their actions to Poles. "We are not against you
description: Thanks to the protest of several dozen of us, climate topics, climatologists and government statements on the matter appeared on television and in newspapers more often than during the whole of last year. This shows that our method works," emphasize activists from the Last Generation group. "Street blockades are our last resort. We do not want to make your lives difficult or direct your anger against us," they emphasize.

title: Poll: Rafał Trzaskowski or Karol Nawrocki? We know who Poles would vote for
description: The PiS-supported IPN president Karol Nawrocki can count on 30.3% of votes in the first round of the presidential elections to be held in 2025. Rafał Trzaskowski is expected to receive 36.9% of votes, according to a new United Surveys poll conducted for Wirtualna Polska.

title: We know the Youth Word of the Year 2024. What does "sigma" mean?
description: By decision of internet users, the word "sigma" was chosen as the Youth Word of the Year 2024. We explain what it actually means.

title: Donald Tusk speaks about the case of the PiS politician's son. "It shocks all of Poland
description: - There can be no sacred cows in Poland, if there is anything sacred in Poland, it is Polish children - said Prime Minister Donald Tusk, opening the government session.

title: A 53-year-old woman was wounded in the head. Police officers were practicing shooting in the area
description: In the Warmian-Masurian province, a woman was injured near a police exercise. An investigation is underway to determine how the incident occurred.

title: Podcast "School Again": Skibidi, sigma - or how do young people create their own language?
description: For the jurors of this year's "Youth Word of the Year" plebiscite, the most interesting word was "czoó". The meaning is standard, but no one knows why there is an "ó" at the end of the word. Or maybe it's just an "o" with an accent?

title: Details of Andrzej Duda's meeting with Karol Nawrocki have been revealed. "He asked for a conversation
description: The head of the presidential office, Małgorzata Paprocka, when asked whether Andrzej Duda would appear in Karol Nawrocki's election campaign, stated that it is not the role of the head of state to get involved in such matters.

title: The army trains local governments in crisis management. We draw conclusions after the flood
description: Crisis management training begins in Wrocław, which will be conducted by the Territorial Defense Forces in cooperation with experts from the War Studies Academy. The army shows the Jaśmin IT system, which has served the armed forces so far.

title: Jarosław Kaczyński on the protesters in front of the Smolensk monument. "Putin's agency
description: Let's hope that the time for justice will come - that those in Poland who are responsible for causing this catastrophe will be properly assessed by the courts. And if the courts find them guilty, that they will be punished - said PiS chairman Jarosław Kaczyński during a press briefing held at the monument to the Victims of the Smolensk Tragedy of 2010.

title: The Power of Threes: The Weimar Triangle for Rural Europe
description: Geopolitics, geography and geometry can sometimes be combined and something good can come of it. One such moment was a meeting of representatives of different European initiatives for sustainable development organized in the Mazovian countryside. The event, which took place on the first weekend of Advent, combined rural, urban, agricultural and EU perspectives to find a common thread towards a more just and sustainable agri-food system.

title: Radosław Fogiel talks about the arrest of Marcin Romanowski. "PO had a terrible weekend
description: According to PiS MP Radosław Fogel, it was no accident that the actions against Marcin Romanowski were taken "after a rather nightmarish weekend from the Platform's point of view". - They got a beating in terms of political communication, because of Rafał Trzaskowski's very shallow convention and Jarosław Kaczyński's presence on the web - he said.

title: The regulations are not keeping up with the presidential pre-campaign
description: Officially unregistered candidates are still organizing meetings with citizens and printing "non-electoral" posters. A legal loophole allows them to do so.

title: Vice Admiral Krzysztof Jaworski: There is a hybrid war going on in the Baltic Sea
description: In the Baltic Sea, we are dealing with terrorist acts. Hybrid warfare is ongoing, says Vice Admiral Krzysztof Jaworski, commander of the Maritime Operations Center.

title: Poll: Poland almost divided in half over Jarosław Kaczyński's immunity
description: In an IBRiS poll for Radio Zet, respondents were asked how they assessed the Sejm's decision to lift the immunity of Jarosław Kaczyński in connection with accusations of assaulting an activist.

title: Vice Admiral Krzysztof Jaworski: There is a hybrid war going on in the Baltic Sea
description: There is already a hybrid war going on in the Baltic Sea, we are dealing with terrorist acts, says Vice Admiral Krzysztof Jaworski, commander of the Maritime Operations Centre.

title: Jacek Nizinkiewicz: The safety of Kaczyński and protesters in the interest of Tusk
description: Monthly provocations and failure to separate protesters from those paying tribute to those who died in the Smolensk disaster may end in another tragedy. It is the state's duty to provide safe conditions for PiS politicians and their opponents.

title: Poll: Rafał Trzaskowski or Karol Nawrocki? The KO candidate's advantage is decreasing
description: Who would Poles vote for in the second round of the presidential election if Rafał Trzaskowski and Karol Nawrocki made it? In December, the advantage of the Civic Coalition candidate over the candidate supported by Law and Justice decreased.

title: Marcin Romanowski arrested. Comments after court decision
description: PiS and Civic Coalition MPs comment on the court's decision to arrest Marcin Romanowski. The PiS MP's party colleagues speak of a "smiling regime", while members of the ruling coalition speak of "accelerating justice".

title: Kindness of Polish services for Waluś. Christmas presents and sausage smuggled behind bars
description: Political murderer Janusz Waluś returned to Poland at the expense of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. Assistance in purchasing a ticket is supposed to be refundable, but the consulate had already been taking surprisingly intensive care of him.

title: “Fake Santa Clauses” and populism – the problems of the Polish economy?
description: Economic policy in Poland is a topic that stirs extreme emotions. In the latest episode of the podcast "Rzecz w tym" we analyze Leszek Balcerowicz's warnings about "false Santa Clauses" handing out expensive gifts to citizens, which in turn burden them. The guest of Monday's podcast episode is Krzysztof Adam Kowalczyk, head of the Economy department of "Rzeczpospolita". We talk about the consequences of handing out money, inflation and economic stagnation, which may prevent Poland from catching

title: New President of the Constitutional Tribunal. Comments after Andrzej Duda's decision
description: President Andrzej Duda has appointed Bogdan Święczkowski as the new president of the Constitutional Tribunal. "Andrzej Duda knows how to deprive this institution of the last remnants of decency" - members of the ruling coalition comment on the president's decision.

title: Michał Szułdrzyński: The Course for Economic Patriotism and Against Globalization. Rafał Trzaskowski's Farewell to Liberalism
description: Rafał Trzaskowski's speech at the convention in Gliwice indicates an ideological change in the Civic Coalition. The criticism of globalization and the rejection of the EU trade agreement with Mercosur are a signal that PO wants to distance itself from elitist demands, directing attention to the problems of millions of Poles.

title: New poll: PiS gains the most and comes out on top
description: PiS has a slight advantage over KO in the IBRiS survey for "Rzeczpospolita". The survey shows a very poor result for the Razem party after it left the Left caucus in the Sejm.

title: There is a prosecutor's office investigation into the death of a professor at a Warsaw university
description: The prosecutor's office has initiated an investigation into the death of Prof. Mirosław Kurkowski, a lecturer at a Warsaw university, who went missing several days ago.

title: This weather is expected until the holidays. The latest forecasts from IMGW
description: There are a dozen or so days left until Christmas. What kind of weather can we expect during that time? Will it be autumn or winter? What about snowfall? Here is the weather forecast for the coming days presented by IMGW.

title: Donald Trump threatens to leave NATO. Radosław Sikorski counts on Andrzej Duda
description: I assume that there is an intensive dialogue between President (Andrzej) Duda and the president-elect (Donald Trump), said Minister of Foreign Affairs Radosław Sikorski at a press conference.

title: Donald Tusk convinces young people. "There are a thousand reasons to live in Poland
description: We want young people who have decided – or fate has decided for them – to live, study and work abroad to return to Poland, said Prime Minister Donald Tusk.

title: End of the year with price increases in commission shops. Cars have become younger, though

However, used cars available in Polish dealerships in November were on average 2.5 years younger and had traveled 15 thousand fewer kilometers compared to the previous year.

title: Bank Blocks Accounts? Customers Complain About Credit Agricole

description:
Record low unemployment, problems with
migration policy, fears of artificial intelligence and rising employment costs are undoubtedly the main features of the labor market in 2024.

title: Seven-figure security fees in Silicon Valley are no surprise. This is how corporations protect their CEOs

Most companies cite the loss of top executives through death or some other, less dramatic, departure as a risk factor. The cost of protection is factored into the business.

Individuals and entrepreneurs will pay a higher tax for each square meter of property they own from January 2025. According to Bankier.pl's analysis, almost all provincial city mayors in Poland have decided to increase property tax to the maximum available rate set by the Minister of Finance.

Michał Niewiadomski talks to Eliza Dąbrowska, director of investment advisory service development at Noble Securities.

title: Ranking of the cheapest cash loans for PLN 25,000

Among the best offers, the differences in the amount of monthly installments are only a few zlotys, which, however, translates into significant amounts over the entire credit period. Check which bank has the lowest total loan costs.

description: In a United Surveys poll for Dziennik Gazeta Prawna and RMF FM, participants were asked which of the leaders of the ruling coalition was their greatest disappointment.

title: Bought a dud? Here's how to get your money back without hiring a lawyer!

Instead of reaching for a lawyer's help, it is worth knowing what tools consumer law gives us. In the following guide, we explain step by step how to effectively file a complaint and get your money back.

title: We will complete inheritance formalities at the notary's office faster
description: Heirs and vindicative legatees who become owners of real estate under a deed of inheritance certification will have a simplified way to disclose their rights in the land and mortgage registers.

title: How to determine minimum daily rest for an employee of a cultural institution?
description: In accordance with the work regulations in force in the cultural institution, we use an intermittent system combined with an equivalent system. Work is performed at very different times of the day. One of our employees is scheduled to work from 8:00 to 14:00, then a five-hour break and then work from 18:00 to 22:00 (a total of 10 hours of work). The next day, he is scheduled to work from 10:00. Is this schedule correct?

title: How to account for the additional work of a part-time employee employed in the equivalent system?
description: Our employee works three-quarters of a full-time equivalent job in monthly settlement periods. The work is planned in daily hours, usually from 6 to 12 hours. In the employment contract, we have specified that he is entitled to an overtime allowance after exceeding an average of 38 hours per week in the settlement period.

title: Ministry of Labor and National Labor Inspectorate: Pensioners cannot be omitted from the regulations of the Employee Benefits Fund
description: Former employees receiving pensions are included in the statutory list of those entitled to social benefits. Their last employers cannot exclude them from it under internal company regulations.

title: The remuneration for special leave granted together with the jubilee allowance is subject to contributions
description: We intend to introduce additional bonuses for employees who are entitled to a jubilee bonus. We want to adopt the principle that, along with the cash bonus, every five years the employee will be entitled to one day off as an additional form of bonus, while retaining the right to remuneration. This leave will not accumulate and will be carried over to subsequent years. Is such remuneration subject to contributions, since it is also awarded as a jubilee bonus?

title: Is illegal parking always taxable?
description: Parking managers should pay VAT on additional fees they collect, for example, for exceeding the parking time, even if they are unable to establish who the driver was or cannot enforce a fine against him, said the head of the National Revenue Administration.

title: The Whistleblower Protection Act. This is the final call for the internal reporting procedure
description: There are several views on when large employers should implement it. Regardless of which one they consider correct, they definitely need to consider January 1, 2025.

title: Appeals of court presidents. WSA shows the way to labor courts
description: The letter of dismissal from the position of the president of the court is an authoritative act of an internal nature, resulting from official subordination. Therefore, it is not subject to the cognition of administrative courts.

title: Should an employee be paid a retirement severance payment if they became entitled to a retirement pension several days after the termination of their employment contract? [HR Consulting]
description: Our employee left work by mutual agreement on December 2, 2024. ZUS granted him a pension from December 5, 2024. Should we pay him a retirement severance payment even though the employee had not yet been granted the right to a pension on the date of termination of the employment contract?

title: Taking advantage of the start-up allowance will not prevent you from receiving the allowance from full-time employment.

However, I would like to formally start running a business from the beginning of January 2025. I want to take advantage of the start-up relief. Can ZUS challenge my right to sickness benefit since I will formally be running a business while still on sick leave?

title: How are Christmas bonuses paid? [Insurance advice]
description: We want to pay our employees Christmas bonuses. These will not be benefits from the company social benefits fund, but we want to differentiate them depending on the earnings of the person. Can we exclude such a bonus from the basis for calculating contributions?

title: Dismissing an employee via text message is flawed but effective
description: A declaration of termination of an employment contract submitted in this way leads to the termination of cooperation, even though it violates the regulations. Therefore, in the case considered by the Supreme Court, the employer had to pay compensation.

title: A special allowance may be included in the benefit base
description: However, it all depends on whether the employee retains the right to the supplement for the periods of receiving benefits. If so, such a component must be excluded from the basis for their assessment.

title: An heir who did not take over the running of the business is also liable for the entrepreneur's contribution debts.
description: My father, who ran a business, died and, as it turned out, had a large debt to ZUS. My siblings took over the business and established a civil partnership for this purpose, which took over my father's employees. I did not join the partnership, but I did not reject the inheritance either. ZUS issued a decision in which it recognized me as the debtor's heir. Is the decision correct, since other people took over the business?

title: An employee may receive a care allowance for the child's sick days chosen by him/her

The certificate covers, among other things, the weekend, but the employee applied for payment of the allowance only for Saturday. Is this permissible?

PiS's complaint in this matter was upheld on Wednesday by the Chamber of Extraordinary Control and Public Affairs of the Supreme Court.

They intend to attack a strategic logistics center that is home to Ukraine's only coking coal mine, which is used for most of the country's steel production. title: The new president of the Constitutional Tribunal accused Tusk of breaking the law
description: - The fact that they are not published in the relevant Journals of Laws or in the Polish Monitor is a technical issue. Of course, the Prime Minister and the services subordinate to him commit a constitutional offence here, but this is of no importance. The Constitutional Tribunal's rulings at the hearing mean that the provisions that the Constitutional Tribunal found unconstitutional have lost the value of the presumption of constitutionality and mean that the ruling becomes binding law - said B

title: Storm after Wrzosek's dismissal. Prosecutor responds to deputy minister

She asked to remain anonymous, but the minister personally forwarded her letters to the rector. The woman was branded an informer, and the university notified the prosecutor's office.

The Ministry of Education wants to ask teachers what to change in the way they grade. "We don't want to impose anything," the Ministry of National Education emphasizes.

title: Disappointing leaders and critical assessments. Poles on Donald Tusk's year in power

title: Pentagon: Russia intends to strike Oreshnik again

The reports from Washington coincide with threats from the Russian Defense Ministry, which said on Wednesday that Moscow would respond to a strike by American ATACMS missiles on the air base in Tangarog.

title: The "Clean Air" program for flood victims is starting. PLN 300 million for renovations

The "Clean Air" program provides PLN 300 million for flood victims, and the subsidies will cover residents of the following provinces: Lower Silesia, Lubuskie, Silesia and Opole.

title: Christmas trees under the tree from RMF FM and Małopolska". Today we are in Kielce
description: We will once again hand out several hundred Christmas trees as part of the "Christmas trees under the Christmas tree from RMF FM and Małopolska" campaign. Our yellow and blue convoy will arrive in Kielce today.

title: Grandma picked up a strange child from school. She took him to training

"I was confused by the boy's hood," she explained.

title: Media: Trump invited Xi to his inauguration
description: US President-elect Donald Trump has invited Chinese leader Xi Jinping to his inauguration in Washington, CBS News reported. Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban is also mentioned as a possible guest.

title: Legia and Jagiellonia to extend "European dream"? Today more LK matches
description: The 5th round of the Conference League regular season is ahead of us. Both Legia Warsaw, who will host Swiss Lugano, and Jagiellonia Białystok, whose rival in the Czech Republic will be FK Mlada Boleslav, will want to continue their successful streak and take another step towards direct promotion to the 1/8 finals of the competition.

title: South Korea's president defends himself, calling it a "monster that destroys order
description: Martial law was supposed to protect the constitutional order, not be a coup, South Korean President Jun Suk Jeol explained on Thursday. The opposition party plans to put a motion to impeach him to a vote next Saturday.

title: Is it finally good or bad? Experts explain Tusk's decision regarding TVN and Polsat
description: Next week, TVN and Polsat are to be added to the list of strategic companies. Experts in an interview with Wirtualnemedia.pl positively assess Prime Minister Donald Tusk's announcement. - Hostile actions are ongoing in the infosphere - emphasizes Jan Dworak.

title: The end of one of the ZPR Media Group's businesses. There will be layoffs
description: The ZPR Media Group has closed the VIVELO Book and Media Fair project. This is expected to result in layoffs, although as the Group's press office explains to us, "we have offered some of the people who worked on organizing the Fair jobs in other positions.

title: KRRiT agrees to TVP's plan. Praise for savings
description: The National Broadcasting Council unanimously accepted the program and financial plans for 2025 of eight regional stations of Polish Radio and Polish Television. As KRRiT member Prof. Tadeusz Kowalski reported in an interview with Wirtualnemedia.pl, during the meeting TVP was praised for demonstrating great savings in the implementation of the mission, reducing costs by almost PLN 0.5 billion.

title: FAQ: From Legal to Human. How TVN and Polsat Can Change Owner
description: Prime Minister Donald Tusk announced that TVN and Polsat will be entered on the list of strategic companies. This means that changing their owner will be more difficult than changing ordinary companies. Sebastian Urban, legal counsel from the Media Law Firm, explains in an interview with Wirtualnemedia.pl that in practice the government would have to issue consent after recommendations from, among others, the Internal Security Agency or the Intelligence Agency.

title: Biedronka is the first commercial brand to use the new advertising platform
description: GroupM and the Wavemaker agency, in cooperation with the Biedronka brand (Jeronimo Martins Polska), have prepared the first commercial Advanced TV campaign using the GPW DAI platform. Partners in this test project also include Telewizja Puls and the Korbank cable network, as well as Emitel.

title: On TV Republika there are four times fewer advertisements, but seven times more money
description: In November, TV Republika broadcast four times fewer commercials than a year ago, but earned seven times more on them. The number of brands active in advertising on the station dropped from 240 to 101 - according to an analysis by Wirtualnemedia.pl.

title: It is known who will replace Ibisz on Polsat's New Year's Eve
description: Polsat has revealed all the hosts of this year's New Year's Eve Power of Hits. Influencer Julia Żugaj will be joined on stage by well-known presenters of the station - Paulina Sykut-Jeżyna and Maciej Rock, however, the Polsat concert will be hosted by a total of three duets.

title: Filming for "Mam Talent!" has begun. No more rumors about cast changes
description: On Tuesday, the recording of the casting episodes for the 16th edition of the program "Mam Talent!" began, which will last until mid-January. The jury and the audience watched the first performances of the participants, who were accompanied backstage by the hosts of the program: Agnieszka Woźniak-Starak and Jan Pirowski.

title: Someone is killing in the Tatras. Review of the series "Śleboda" from SkyShowtime
description: SkyShowtime has added a new Polish series, "Śleboda," directed by Michał Gazda. The crime drama is based on a novel by Małgorzata Fugiel-Kuźmińska and Michał Kuźmiński. The production touches on a topic also known from this year's film, "White Courage," the Goralenvolk, and its modern interpretation.

title: Regional stations of Polish Radio want more from advertising. "Reaction to inflation
description: Audytorium17, an association of seventeen regional Polish Radio stations, will increase advertising prices by an average of 15 percent from January 2025. - The price list adjustment is the result of the new commercial policy adopted by the company and is a response to inflation, which forces us to adjust our price lists - explains Piotr Bziuk, client service director at Audytorium17, in an interview with Wirtualnemedia.pl.

title: Canal+ Polska signal stolen again by Palestinian station
description: Palestinian television Fajer TV1 is stealing Canal+ Polska's signal again. The latest match was La Liga Girona - Real Madrid. Part of the Canal+ Sport logo and the words "Live" were visible on the screen. - We will submit a letter demanding that they stop distributing our content - informs Wirtualnemedia.pl Piotr Kaniowski, spokesman for Canal+ Polska.

title: This weekend sees the debut of the TVP cabaret show. What have the comedians prepared?
description: On Saturday, December 14, the program "Kabaret Łączy Genera" will debut on Dwójka, featuring satirists of the younger and older generations. The station has revealed the details of the new program.

title: Journalist leaves Viaplay
description: Adam Drygalski is parting ways with Viaplay, where he worked as head of publishers. In the past, he worked with Polsat, Orange Sport and Weszło, among others.

title: Champions League stations for free. Canal+ promotion returns
description: New satellite subscribers to the digital platform Canal+ can once again gain up to five months of free access to the Champions League package. Current customers, after activating this package, gain four months for free. - The promotion enjoyed such great interest that it has returned - informs Wirtualnemedia.pl Piotr Kaniowski, spokesman for Canal+ Polska.

title: The Ministry of Agriculture has chosen an agency for an online campaign
description: The Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development has announced a tender for conducting a campaign on the Internet and in social media. Nine agencies have applied.

title: They disassemble cars "For parts". New episodes of the podcast of Polskie Radio Kierowców
description: Polskie Radio Kierowców invites listeners and internet users to new episodes of the automotive program "Na Części", in which Kuba Marcinowicz tests interesting car models. As the station assures, this season too, there are many surprises waiting for viewers.

title: Krzysztof Wąsowski, head of marketing at RITS
description: Krzysztof Wąsowski has taken up the position of marketing director at RITS, a company operating in the technology industry.

title: The pace of change is accelerating. Download our 2025 Trendbook
description: The media, marketing and digital services market is changing dynamically. What was this year like and what will the next one be like? Download BRAND NEW(S) Trendbook 2025.

description: Will there be a revolution in grading? The Ministry of National Education will ask teachers whether it is always worth giving grades

description: What do Poles think about health education in schools? Survey

title: Meeting of Deputy Minister Zalewski with the Ambassador of Japan to Poland
description: On Wednesday, December 11, this year, Secretary of State at the Ministry of National Defense Paweł Zalewski held a meeting with the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Japan to Poland KONO Akira.

title: Israel attacks Syrian ships [VIDEO]
description: Israel attacks Syrian ships [VIDEO]

description: Lockheed Martin to Deliver More Black Hawk Helicopters to US Army
