title: Marcin Romanowski wanted on an arrest warrant
description: The National Prosecutor's Office has launched a search warrant for Marcin Romanowski. On Monday, the court decided to detain the PiS MP for three months. The former deputy minister of justice is suspected in the Justice Fund case. He has been charged with 11 counts.

title: After meeting with Macron, Tusk spoke about the military mission in Ukraine
description: Prime Minister Donald Tusk spoke in superlatives about the political rapprochement between Poland and France. Emmanuel Macron came to Warsaw to talk with Polish authorities about the geopolitical situation, the war in Ukraine and cooperation with Poland. "We are on the same side regarding the security of Europe and a just peace in Ukraine," the head of the Polish government said at a conference after meeting with Macron. He also assured that Poland does not currently plan to have troops in Ukrai

title: The Schengen Area is expanding by two countries
description: From 1 January 2025, checks on travellers at land borders with Bulgaria and Romania will be abolished. EU interior ministers decided on Thursday to include both countries in the full Schengen area.

title: There was a smell of gas in the kindergarten. Children and staff were evacuated
description: Emergency services evacuated a kindergarten in Ustronie Morskie (West Pomeranian Voivodeship). There was a gas leak in the building.

title: Important position for Morawiecki. Even before Trump's inauguration
description: Former Polish Prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki is to take over the leadership of the European Conservatives and Reformists (ECR) party from Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni, according to the Italian daily Il Giornale. The decision is to be announced in Rome. Meloni has served as the ECR president since 2020.

title: Christmas trees under the tree from RMF FM and Małopolska". Today we were in Kielce
description: We have distributed several hundred Christmas trees once again as part of the "Christmas trees under the Christmas tree from RMF FM and Małopolska" campaign. Our yellow and blue convoy arrived in Kielce today.

title: There is a judgment of the European Court of Justice in the case of Getin Noble Bank and Swiss franc borrowers
description: The national court should examine not only the complaint of the supervisory board of Getin Noble Bank about its compulsory restructuring, but also over 8,000 other complaints, filed, among others, by Swiss franc borrowers. Such a verdict was issued by the Court of Justice of the European Union on Thursday.

title: Palikot's alcohol company goes bankrupt. And it was supposed to set Kuba Wojewódzki up for generations
description: The court declared bankruptcy of the company Manufaktura Piwa Wódki i Wina, in which Janusz Palikot was the boss and main shareholder, and Kuba Wojewódzki was a minority investor and the hero of its beer commercials. Palikot has been in custody since October. Wojewódzki cut himself off from him at the beginning of this year, although three years ago he believed that thanks to this investment he would be financially independent "two generations ahead".

title: From TVN to Polsat. Expert joins the program "Our New Home
description: Dariusz Wardziak, known from the TVN program "Total Remonty Szelągoskiej", moves to the competition. The carpenter will strengthen the team of the program "Nasz Nowy Dom" and will also appear on Polsat with an original project.

title: Makeshift is Polish national design. Why do we need temporary solutions?
description: - Cities have a tendency to self-destruct. Let's treat them like a living being and take them to an urban therapist - said Chris Bangle, designer. Watch the report from the debate "How to prepare cities for the challenges of the future

title: II Masovian Football Gala
description: On Saturday, the 2nd Masovian Football Gala took place. In a great atmosphere, the passing year in Masovian football was summed up.

title: Luxury McLaren torn in half
description: A McLaren 570s luxury car was torn in half in a crash in Dallas, killing both occupants and injuring the driver of the other vehicle involved.

title: We will certainly not sacrifice our agriculture
description: I do not agree with the agreement between the European Union and the Mercosur countries in its current form - said French President Emmanuel Macron during a press conference. During a joint meeting with Donald Tusk with the media, he emphasized that "there are concerns about the impact of the agreement on the agricultural market". - We will certainly not sacrifice our agriculture in the name of mercantilism from the last century - declared the French leader.

title: Particularly dangerous criminal" killed in Moscow
description: Mikhail Shatsky, deputy chief designer of the Mars Design Bureau, which is involved in, among other things, modernizing cruise missiles used to attack Ukraine, was killed in Moscow, Ukrainian media reported. According to media reports, the assassination was carried out by Ukrainian military intelligence (HUR).

title: They flew down to the Sabbaths, cast spells, played tricks, and didn't fly on brooms at all. Today is the witches' holiday
description: According to folk beliefs, December 12, the eve of St. Lucy, was the witches' holiday. On that day and on the night of December 12-13, witches would gather for their Sabbaths to have fun, argue, and fight for power for the next year. They would also think of tricks to play on people.

title: Investigation into the implementation of the "Work for Prisoners" program
description: There is a prosecutor's investigation into the abuse of power and failure to perform duties by public officials from the Central Board of the Prison Service, the District Inspectorate in Rzeszów and the Prison in Rzeszów. The District Prosecutor's Office in Kielce reported that it concerns suspicions of committing crimes related to the implementation of the "Work for Prisoners" program and the rental of a warehouse on the premises of the Prison in Rzeszów.

title: After the performance, a piece of scenography fell on her. She was taken to hospital with serious injuries.
description: After a performance at the Apollo cinema in Poznań, a piece of scenography fell on a woman. "It was a metal piece of scaffolding supporting the lighting," explains junior cadet Anna Klój from the Poznań police. The woman was taken to hospital. She could not yet be questioned.

title: Lower interest rates in the euro zone. There is a decision from the bank
description: The ECB Governing Council has cut key interest rates by 25 basis points, it said in a statement after the meeting. The ECB said the disinflation process was progressing. On Thursday, the Swiss National Bank also decided to cut rates.

title: Suspect Marcin Romanowski wanted on an arrest warrant
description: The court issued a decision to temporarily arrest the suspect Marcin Romanowski. To date, police officers have not been able to determine his whereabouts or arrest him. The information obtained indicates that the suspect is in hiding. In connection with this, the prosecutor decided today to issue a decision to search for Marcin Romanowski with an arrest warrant - informed the spokesman for the National Prosecutor's Office, Przemysław Nowak.

title: They were arrested in a car theft case. Their companion was searched for in the river by the services
description: Police arrested a 25-year-old and a 21-year-old after they failed to stop for a traffic stop in a stolen car. The man allegedly stole the car and put the Lubusz fire department and police on their feet a week earlier.

title: The weather will once again pose a threat. IMGW alerts in most provinces
description: The Institute of Meteorology and Water Management warns of weather that may cause significant difficulties on roads and sidewalks. In the coming hours, freezing precipitation causing icing is expected. First-degree warnings have been issued in 11 provinces.

title: You can't be a candidate for the president of Poland and hide criminals
description: Karol Nawrocki's staff is actively participating in hiding MP Marcin Romanowski. We would like to appeal to Mr. Karol Nawrocki to fully cooperate with the prosecutor's office - said the Minister of Sport Sławomir Nitras. He referred to the statements of PiS politicians who spoke of Romanowski's "civil disobedience". - How is it that someone who wants to become president has in his circle people who are hiding a potential criminal - asked the Deputy Minister of Defense Cezary Tomczyk.

title: 18-year-old sent to prison for holiday romance
description: Marcus Fakana, an 18-year-old Briton, was sentenced to a year in prison in Dubai for having sex with a girl he met there. They were both on holiday with their parents. "I urge young people and their parents to think twice about holidaying in Dubai," the convict's legal representative said in a statement. Sexual contact with a person under the age of 18 is prohibited in the city.

title: Will Syria turn into a religious autocracy? What awaits the Kurds? Who is returning and who will flee?
description: The fall of the Assad regime opens another chapter in Syria's turbulent history, but does it bode well for stability? Radical Islamist groups currently have the greatest chance of taking power. The country could turn into an autocracy based on radical religious interpretations. And the biggest losers of the civil war that has been going on since 2011 could be the Kurds.

title: Christmas shopping will be more expensive this year. Where will we spend the least?
description: The average price of a Christmas basket increased by 4.58 percent year on year, and the cheapest shopping for Christmas Eve and the two days of Christmas could be done at Dino, the research agency ASM SFA reported.

title: Media: Donald Trump's second Time Person of the Year award. He is set to join an elite group
description: Donald Trump is set to once again be Time magazine's Person of the Year 2024, Reuters reported unofficially. If the information is confirmed, the president-elect will join a small group of two-time winners of the title.

title: He hit a pedestrian and drove away, the woman is in serious condition. Charges and arrest for taxi driver
description: A 63-year-old taxi driver has been charged with causing an accident, suspected of hitting a woman in Warsaw's Mokotów district. As investigators have determined, the pedestrian had a green light. The driver left the seriously injured woman on the roadway. The injured woman is fighting for her life in hospital.

title: Warning! Storms are possible
description: Weather forecasts for the end of this week and the beginning of next week do not look optimistic. Forecasters predict very strong winds, which in gusts may exceed 100 kilometers per hour. The most dangerous will be on Tuesday.

title: In the library they found a priceless work from the 15th century. Exceptionally rare in the world, the first in Poland
description: A valuable discovery of an incunabulum in the library of the Bernardine Fathers' province of the Immaculate Conception of the Blessed Virgin Mary in Krakow. It dates back to the 15th century and was previously unknown in Poland.

title: Child in the window of life. A man has come forward claiming to be the father. He wants his daughter back
description: The 11-month-old girl was found in the window of life in Gdańsk Matemblewo by nuns. The next day, a 32-year-old man reported to the police station. He said he was the child's father and wanted to get back his daughter, who he believed had been left in the window by her mother. He has already been questioned. The girl is currently in a foster family, and the case is being handled by the court.

title: Woman shot dead in yard, her husband's body in car. DNA test results in
description: DNA test results confirmed that the body of a 53-year-old from Siedlce, suspected of shooting his wife, was in the burnt car wreck. A large-scale search for the man was conducted after the body of a woman with gunshot wounds was found in the yard.

title: Explosion in the US. Garbage truck injures police officers
description: Two police officers and one firefighter were injured in a garbage truck explosion in suburban Illinois. The cause of the incident is under investigation, and the injured officers are recovering.

title: Emmanuel Macron cuts Poland visit short due to new prime minister's nomination
description: French President Emmanuel Macron will shorten his visit to Warsaw and return to Paris earlier. The decision may be related to the nomination of a new prime minister.

description: - The prosecutor decided today to issue a decision to search for Marcin Romanowski with an arrest warrant - said Przemysław Nowak, spokesman for the National Prosecutor's Office. He added that hiding him also constitutes a crime.

title: Tusk's Sudden Step. Was He Convinced by "Secret Information"?
description: Prime Minister Donald Tusk announced that TVN and Polsat would be added to the list of strategic entities, which is intended to prevent them from being taken over by a hostile state. - The Prime Minister and the government probably react in this way to information that is not publicly disclosed - explains WP media expert Prof. Jacek Dąbała.

title: Mother leaves child in window of life, father tries to get him back
description: A one-year-old girl was left in the window of life in Gdańsk at the beginning of December. As it turned out, the child was briefly cared for by her mother, who left her there. Now the father, who found out about the whole thing after the fact, is trying to get his daughter back.

title: Nitras accuses Nawrocki and his staff of hiding Romanowski
description: Minister of Sport Sławomir Nitras demanded from the staff and Karol Nawrocki himself full cooperation with the police, prosecutor's office and court in the case of the hiding MP Romanowski. - There are serious indications of the complicity of Mr. Nawrocki's staff in hiding Romanowski, who is wanted by the law," wrote the minister. PiS MP Radosław Fogiel quickly responded to the post.

title: There is an arrest warrant for Marcin Romanowski. The Justice Fund is in the background
description: The prosecutor issued an arrest warrant for Marcin Romanowski on Thursday, with respect to whom the court decided to place him for three months in custody - informed the spokesman of the Prosecutor's Office, Przemysław Nowak. The PiS MP, former deputy head of the Ministry of Justice, is suspected of, among other things, rigging competitions for multi-million grants from the Justice Fund.

description: Russian leader Vladimir Putin has not received an invitation to the inauguration of new US President Donald Trump scheduled for January 20, Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said on Thursday.

title: Most Poles consider weather anomalies to be a serious threat. What are we afraid of?
description: 77% of surveyed Polish women and men perceive weather anomalies – which are, among other things, the result of climate change – as a serious threat to the lives of current and future generations. 78% of respondents believe that each of us should take corrective action – according to the Autopay study "Ecological attitudes of Polish women and men 2024".

title: Donald Trump is Time Magazine's Person of the Year
description: Donald Trump has been named Time magazine's Person of the Year. "For many years, this was a difficult choice. In 2024, it was not," we read in the justification on the magazine's pages.

title: A new government has been sworn in in Lithuania. A Pole from Vilnius is the head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs.
description: A new government has been sworn in in Lithuania. A Pole from Vilnius is the head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs.

title: Shopping Sundays in December 2024. Will stores be open on December 15?
description: December is a time of intensive preparations for Christmas, as well as an opportunity to take advantage of the last Sundays of shopping this year. In Poland, since 2018, there has been a restriction on Sunday trading, which means that most stores, including shopping malls, remain closed. The exception are designated Sundays of shopping - in December 2024, as many as two are planned.

title: Changeable weather will attack Poland. Extreme conditions are coming [IMGW FORECAST]
description: According to the forecasts of the Institute of Meteorology and Water Management (IMGW), the coming week will bring changeable weather, which will alternate frosty and clearer days with heavy snowfall, rain and gusty winds. But what exactly awaits us?

title: 324.39 PLN from ZUS for these people. Some will receive money without an application
description: The care allowance of PLN 324.39 is a benefit granted by ZUS. People who are 75 years old or older are automatically entitled to it, without having to submit an application. The necessary condition for receiving this benefit is usually meeting two criteria. Here are the details.

title: There is an arrest warrant for Romanowski. The National Prosecutor's Office confirms
description: The National Prosecutor announced that an arrest warrant had been issued for Marcin Romanowski on Thursday. The decision was made after a motion by the Warsaw Police Headquarters, which indicated that the PiS MP and former deputy head of the Ministry of Justice was in hiding. Earlier, the District Court for Warsaw-Mokotów ordered a three-month arrest against him on suspicion of rigging competitions for grants from the Justice Fund.

title: From January 1st, big and more restrictive changes in waste segregation. You will no longer be able to throw it in the bin. Otherwise, a severe penalty
description: At the beginning of 2025, new legal regulations will be introduced in Poland regarding the segregation of textiles and construction and demolition waste, aimed at increasing the efficiency of recycling and reducing the negative impact on the natural environment. Here are the details.

title: The shocking truth about Archbishop Jędraszewski. Terlikowski: They broke his spine
description: What event in the life of Archbishop Marek Jędraszewski caused him to "go to the dark side of power", that is, from a once warm and well-liked man, he turned into a gloomy ideologist, digging deep social divisions? Interesting facts on this subject are presented by Tomasz Terlikowski.
